}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [[Realtek]] RTL8723BS (1T1R 802.11bgn) BT 4.0
*[[AzureWave AW-NB177NF]] :Wi-Fi: 802.11b/g/n :Frequency: 2.4 GHz :Bluetooth: 4.0 (BLE) :Antenna: 1x1 Diversity :Interface: SDIO / UART :Form factor: M.2 (1216) :Dimension: 12 x 16 x 1.75 mm
